item.title: CVE-2024-32541|2024-04-17T08:29:05.344Z -- Tobias Battenberg -- WP-Cufon
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Tobias Battenberg WP-Cufon allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP-Cufon: from n/a through 1.6.10.
